statements: UPDATE DemographicData SET annual_income = 75000 WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE DemographicData SET retirement_goal = 100000, age = 35 WHERE user_id = '78901234-5678-9012-3456-789012345678';
UPDATE DemographicData SET age = 30, annual_income = 80000.50 WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE DemographicData SET retirement_goal = 100000.00, age = 40 WHERE user_id = '654321e9-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE demographic_data SET income = 50000.50, current_savings = 10000.75 WHERE user_id = 123
UPDATE retirement_plans SET risk_tolerance = 'Low Risk', recommended_investment = 25000.25 WHERE user_id = 123
UPDATE demographic_data SET income = 75000, current_savings = current_savings + 2000 WHERE user_id = 101;
UPDATE retirement_plans SET risk_tolerance = 'High Risk', recommended_investment = recommended_investment * 1.1 WHERE user_id = 201;
UPDATE demographics SET age = 35, income = 75000 WHERE member_id = 101;
UPDATE retirement_planning SET recommended_income_range = '50,000 - 100,000', plan_name = 'Investment Fund' WHERE plan_id = 201;
UPDATE demographics SET age = 35, income = 75000 WHERE member_id = 101;
UPDATE retirement_planning SET recommended_age_group = 3, recommended_income_range = '50000 - 100000' WHERE plan_id = 201;
UPDATE demographics SET income = 50000 WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male';
UPDATE retirement_plans SET description = 'Updated retirement plan description' WHERE plan_id = 3;
UPDATE demographics SET gender = 'Male', income = 50000 WHERE age >= 30 AND location = 'New York';
UPDATE retirement_plans SET description = 'Enhanced retirement benefits with increased contributions', level_id = 3 WHERE plan_id = 101;
UPDATE AgeGroups SET min_age=30, max_age=60 WHERE group_id=1;
UPDATE IncomeLevels SET min_income=50000.00, max_income=100000.00 WHERE level_id=2;
UPDATE AgeGroups SET min_age = 30 WHERE group_id = 1;
UPDATE Customers SET income = 75000.00, group_id = 2 WHERE customer_id = 3;
